timeline.bodyText: This should be in the change log.
timeline.author: smillst

timeline.message: Rename one overload of printMessage to printOrStoreMessage
Make a private method private; create a general method that dispatches to implementations
Adapt to changes on master branch
Remove link to method that has been deleted

timeline.bodyText: Should this method be private? Or protected? I don't see a need for package visibility.
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText: Could we move/keep these support/debugging methods to the bottom of the file? Is there a reason to move them up?
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: It is only called by init, so I put it next to init.  I have now moved it to the end of the file.
replies.author: mernst

timeline.bodyText: I would also move shutdown logic towards the bottom.
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure what the "main entry point" is supposed to mean. Can you clarify?
The two methods that visitors should use are report() and message(Diagnostic.Kind kind, String msg, Object... args), so maybe list those two?
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: message is documented as being "only for exceptional cases".  So report is the method that clients should prefer.
replies.author: mernst

timeline.bodyText:
Should this method be called warnUnneededSuppressions, like the other method above?
How does a developer chose between the two version?
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText: That was the name before, but I have changed it.
replies.author: mernst

timeline.message: Move some methods to the end of the file, and rename a method
